Text: Hey Its Gud To Get you Back, well Hw would we get to know about ur updates??? n whts next dear???

DO NOT, I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS TORRENT!!!  

i have been downloading here as well as other public sites for several years now.  i have not received a copyright infringement notice or suspension from my isp in over 3 years thanks to necessary precautions.  i also am an avid uploader at a couple of private sites and by private i do not mean demonoid.
